Modelling Emergence and Maximun Canopy

Source: vignettes/canopy-model.Rmd
canopy-model.Rmd

Loading libraries 

library(exploreHTP)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggpubr)
library(purrr)

Reading data read_HTP() 

data(dt_potato)
results <- dt_potato |>
  read_HTP(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    id = Plot,
    .keep = c(Gen, Row, Range)
  )
names(results)
#> [1] "summ_traits"    "metadata"       "locals_min_max" "dt_long"       
#> [5] ".keep"

Data exploration 

p1 <- plot(results, type = "evolution", return_gg = TRUE)
p2 <- plot(results, type = "time_by_trait", return_gg = TRUE)
ggarrange(p1, p2)

Canopy 100 25.62 82.32 87.28 99.69 15.20 0.18 196 0 0 0
Canopy 108 6.41 68.29 74.22 98.94 21.42 0.31 196 0 0 0

Target Function

fn_piwise()

\[\begin{equation} f(t; t_1, t_2, k) = \begin{cases} 0 & \text{if } t < t_1 \\ \dfrac{k}{t_2 - t_1} \cdot (t - t_1) & \text{if } t_1 \leq t \leq t_2 \\ k & \text{if } t > t_2 \end{cases} \end{equation}\]

Fitting Models 

mod_1 <- modeler_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "Canopy",
  id = c(195, 40),
  parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
  fn = "fn_piwise"
)
mod_1
#> 
#> Call:
#> Canopy ~ fn_piwise(x, t1, t2, k) 
#> 
#> Sum of Squares Error:
#>    Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
#>   390.5  1004.2  1618.0  1618.0  2231.8  2845.5 
#> 
#> Optimization Results `head()`:
#>  uid   t1   t2    k  sse  auc
#>   40 34.8 53.7 72.5 2846 4623
#>  195 38.7 60.0 91.7  390 5377
#> 
#> Metrics:
#>  Ids      Timing Convergence Iterations
#>    2 1.2588 secs        100%   547 (id)
plot(mod_1, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_1$param)
uid Gen Row Range t1 t2 k sse auc
40 W17043-37 12 3 34.79943 53.73295 72.5438 2845.5421 4623.494
195 W16219-8 13 14 38.72534 60.04934 91.7450 390.4596 5377.416

Providing different initial values 

initials <- results |>
  pluck("dt_long") |>
  filter(var %in% "Canopy" & uid %in% c(195, 40)) |>
  group_by(uid) |>
  summarise(k = max(y), .groups = "drop") |>
  mutate(t1 = c(40, 60), t2 = c(70, 80), .before = k)
kable(initials)
uid t1 t2 k
40 40 70 100
195 60 80 100 
mod_2 <- modeler_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "Canopy",
  id = c(195, 40),
  parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
  fn = "fn_piwise",
  initial_vals = initials
)
plot(mod_2, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_2$param)
uid Gen Row Range t1 t2 k sse auc
40 W17043-37 12 3 34.79943 53.73295 72.5438 2845.5421 4623.494
195 W16219-8 13 14 38.72534 60.04934 91.7450 390.4596 5377.416

Fixing some parameters of the model 

fixed_params <- results |>
  pluck("dt_long") |>
  filter(var %in% "Canopy" & uid %in% c(195, 40)) |>
  group_by(uid) |>
  summarise(k = max(y), .groups = "drop")
kable(fixed_params)
uid k
40 100
195 100 
mod_3 <- modeler_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "Canopy",
  id = c(195, 40),
  parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
  fn = "fn_piwise",
  fixed_params = fixed_params
)
plot(mod_3, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_3$param)
uid Gen Row Range t1 t2 sse k auc
40 W17043-37 12 3 34.80771 60.84828 6268.4633 100 6017.198
195 W16219-8 13 14 38.72534 61.96802 663.0397 100 5765.332

Correcting Maximun value 

mod_4 <- modeler_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "Canopy",
  id = c(195, 40),
  parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
  fn = "fn_piwise",
  fixed_params = fixed_params,
  max_as_last = TRUE
)
plot(mod_4, id = c(195, 40))

kable(mod_4$param)
uid Gen Row Range t1 t2 sse k auc
40 W17043-37 12 3 34.80771 60.84828 0.0014765 100 6017.198
195 W16219-8 13 14 38.72534 61.96802 0.0000000 100 5765.332

Comparing Models 

rbind.data.frame(
  mutate(mod_1$param, mod = "1"),
  mutate(mod_2$param, mod = "2"),
  mutate(mod_3$param, mod = "3"),
  mutate(mod_4$param, mod = "4")
) |>
  filter(uid %in% 40) |>
  kable()

Code 

results <- dt_potato |>
  read_HTP(
    x = DAP,
    y = Canopy,
    id = Plot,
    .keep = c(Gen, Row, Range)
  )
fixed_params <- results$dt_long |>
  filter(var %in% "Canopy") |>
  group_by(uid) |>
  summarise(k = max(y), .groups = "drop")
mod <- modeler_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "Canopy",
  id = NULL,
  parameters = c(t1 = 45, t2 = 80, k = 0.9),
  fn = "fn_piwise",
  fixed_params = fixed_params,
  max_as_last = TRUE
)
